From: "Logo morph" <logomorph@...>

::Battera::

She stopped dead in her tracks.  She turned and glared at him.
"That's because I am one. I was talking to some friends who promised me a 
ticket home, back to Cybertron.  But then HellBeast and his cronees came 
busting in, accused us of mutany and told us to surrender or die.  I barely 
escaped out a ventalation shaft.  But in doing so I abandoned my friends.  I 
let them die to save myself.  I was a coward.  I ran when I should have 
stayed to fight." She stopped yellingfor a moment.  But tears were streaming 
down her face plates.
"I ran and left them behind to die.  I'm a murderer alright.  I should have 
stayed to fight and maybe even die with them.  Instead I fled like a true 
coward!" She yelled the word coward.  She turned her back on Cybershark and 
covered her face with her hands.


---------Orginal Message------
From:   <Dachande85@a...>
Date: Thu Jun 29, 2000 2:40am
Subject: Neo Beast Wars



::CyberShark::

    "Wait!! You can't leave the base yet! You'll be destroyed by the
autoguns." Cybershark said as he tried to catch up with her. "Your gonna 
need
this, and really you talk about your self as though you are a murderer."
